tr_quotes.quote: Bizim için veda yok. Nerede olursan ol, her zaman kalbimde olacaksın.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandi

tr_quotes.quote: Bugün için güç ve yarın için umut diliyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Renee O'neill

tr_quotes.quote: Bir zamanlar zevk aldığımız şeyi asla kaybedemeyiz. Derinden sevdiğimiz her şey bizim bir parçamız olur.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Sevdiğiniz birini kaybettiğinizde, tanıdığınız bir meleği kazanırsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bugün ve her zaman, sevgi dolu anılar size huzur, rahatlık ve güç getirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluğumuzda ne kadar güçlü olduğumuzu ve sefaletinde ne kadar zayıf olduğunu hatırla!
tr_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

tr_quotes.quote: Sevdiklerimiz ve kaybettiklerimiz her zaman kalp telleriyle sonsuzluğa bağlanır.
tr_quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya acılarla dolu olsa da aynı zamanda bu acıların üstesinden gelmekle de doludur.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Sempati, iki kalbin bir yükte çekişmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

tr_quotes.quote: Kaybı gerçekten hissetmenize izin verene kadar, bir kaybı gerçekten iyileştiremezsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Mandy Hale

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat, fırtınanın geçmesini beklemek değildir; yağmurda dans etmeyi öğrenmekle ilgili.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Acıyı ifade etmek çok kolay ama anlatmak bir o kadar zor.
tr_quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarının ıztırabına sempati duymak, anlayışı geliştirir, ancak bu, onların size katlanacakları anlamına gelmez.
tr_quotes.author: Benson Bruno

tr_quotes.quote: Elimden geldiğince bu dünyaya ikimiz için bakacağım, yapabildiğim kadar kuşlarla güleceğim, çiçeklerle şarkı söyleyeceğim, ikimiz için.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sevinçlerimiz daha büyük olacak, aşkımız daha derin olacak, hayatımız daha dolu olacak çünkü anını paylaştık.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Acı kesindir, acı çekmek isteğe bağlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Buda

tr_quotes.quote: Kabul edilmiş erdemle bağdaşmayan tüm sempatiler, kılık değiştirmiş bencillikten başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

tr_quotes.quote: Yağmurda şarkı söyleyen bir kuş gibi, hüzünlü anlarda minnet dolu anıların yaşamasına izin verin.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

tr_quotes.quote: Beni her gördüğünde kalp atışların hızlansın istiyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın bir lütuf, hafızan bir hazineydi. Kelimelerin ötesinde seviliyorsun ve ölçüsüzce özleniyorsun.
tr_quotes.author: Renee Wood

tr_quotes.quote: Sempatik şefkatimizi geliştirmek sadece mümkün değil, aynı zamanda burada, dünyada olmamızın tek nedenidir.
tr_quotes.author: George Saunders

tr_quotes.quote: Gece ne kadar karanlıksa, yıldızlar o kadar parlak, keder o kadar derin, Tanrı o kadar yakın!
tr_quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Sana hatırlaman için çok şey veren birini unutmak zor.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendisi için hiçbir şey istememek ve beklememek ve başkaları için derin bir sempati beslemek gerçek dostluktur.
tr_quotes.author: İvan Turgenev

tr_quotes.quote: Beni gitmiş gibi düşünme. Her yeni şafakta hala seninleyim.
tr_quotes.author: Kızılderili Şiiri

tr_quotes.quote: Üzüntü duymalıyız ama onun zulmüne girmemeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Seni her düşündüğümde bir çiçeğim olsaydı, bahçemde sonsuza kadar yürüyebilirdim.
tr_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı insanlar hayatımıza girer, kalplerimizde ayak izleri bırakır ve biz asla eskisi gibi olamayız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sevilen ölmez, çünkü aşk ölümsüzlüktür.
tr_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

tr_quotes.quote: Ağlayanlar, gülenlerden daha çabuk iyileşir.
tr_quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan hayatı, Allah tarafından anlatılan bir hikayedir.
tr_quotes.author: Hans Christian Anderson

tr_quotes.quote: Güneş, ay, rüzgar, yıldızlar sonsuza dek etrafta olacak ve size paylaştığınız sevgiyi ve sonunda bulduğu huzuru hatırlatacak.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sempatik bir arkadaş, bir kardeş kadar değerli olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Homeros

tr_quotes.quote: Denemelerimiz, üzüntülerimiz ve kederlerimiz bizi geliştirir.
tr_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

tr_quotes.quote: Aşk, onun yanındayken huzurly olmaktır
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada daha az sempati olsaydı, dünyada daha az sorun olurdu.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Beni gülümseyerek ve kahkahalarla hatırla, çünkü ben hepinizi böyle hatırlayacağım. Beni sadece gözyaşlarıyla hatırlayabiliyorsan, beni hiç hatırlama.
tr_quotes.author: Laura Ingles Wilder

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın trajedisi yaşarken insanın içinde ölenlerdedir.
tr_quotes.author: Norman Kuzenleri

tr_quotes.quote: Sempati, iki kalbin bir yükte çekişmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Acıya sempati duymak, düşünceye sempati duymaktan çok daha kolaydır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir zamanlar zevk aldığımız şeyi asla kaybedemeyiz. Derinden sevdiğimiz her şey bizim bir parçamız olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ve kim de merhametsizce yürürse, kefeniyle kendi cenaze cübbesine gider.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kabul edilmiş erdemle bağdaşmayan her sempati, kılık değiştirmiş bencillikten başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın bir lütuf, hafızan bir hazineydi. Kelimelerin ötesinde seviliyorsun ve ölçüsüzce özleniyorsun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sempatik şefkatimizi geliştirmek sadece mümkün değil, aynı zamanda burada, dünyada olmamızın tek nedenidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir zamanlar zevk aldığımız şeyi asla kaybedemeyiz; derinden sevdiğimiz her şey bizim bir parçamız olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sempati tek başına gerçekleri değiştiremese de, onları daha katlanılabilir hale getirmeye yardımcı olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Bram Stoker

tr_quotes.quote: Ağlayanlar, gülenlerden daha çabuk iyileşir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İyi şeyler birdenbire olur; bu kadar bekletmez insanı.
tr_quotes.author: Oğuz Atay

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan hayatı, Allah tarafından anlatılan bir hikayedir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayvanlar, sevgi ve sempatinin yanı sıra, bizde ahlaki olarak adlandırılabilecek toplumsal içgüdülerle bağlantılı başka nitelikler de sergilerler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Üzüntünün olduğu yerde kutsal toprak vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Karanlık, ağaçları ve çiçekleri gözlerden saklayabilir ama sevgiyi ruhtan gizleyemez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ben onun ismine bile aşığım, gerisini siz düşünün
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güzel olan asla ölmez ama başka bir güzelliğe geçer.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Baily Aldrich

tr_quotes.quote: Bir yerlerde en güzel yine sen gülüyorsun. Görmesem de biliyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: There is no pain so great as the memory of joy in present grief
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: Flowers grow out of dark moments
en_quotes.author: Corita Kent

en_quotes.quote: Sorrow is a fruit. God does not make it grow on limbs too weak to bear it
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: We should feel sorrow, but not sink under its oppression
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Sorrow can be alleviated by good sleep, a bath and a glass of wine
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: The dew of compassion is a tear
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Grief can't be shared. Everyone carries it alone. His own burden in his own way
en_quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

en_quotes.quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery
en_quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

en_quotes.quote: When you lose a person you love so much, surviving the loss is difficult
en_quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

en_quotes.quote: Tears are the silent language of grief
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: People who drink to drown their sorrow should be told that sorrow knows how to swim
en_quotes.author: Ann Landers

en_quotes.quote: Life has never been easy. Nor is it meant to be. It is a matter of being joyous in the face of sorrow
en_quotes.author: Dirk Benedict

en_quotes.quote: When sorrows come, they come not single spies, but in battalions
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Grief is the price we pay for love
en_quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

en_quotes.quote: Bear and endure: This sorrow will one day prove to be for your good
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Here bring your wounded hearts, here tell your anguish; Earth has no sorrow that Heaven cannot heal
en_quotes.author: Thomas Moore

en_quotes.quote: The loss of a friend is like that of a limb; time may heal the anguish of the wound, but the loss cannot be repaired
en_quotes.author: Robert Southey

en_quotes.quote: Truly, it is in darkness that one finds the light, so when we are in sorrow, then this light is nearest of all to us
en_quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

en_quotes.quote: Grief changes shape, but it never ends
en_quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

en_quotes.quote: I think loss of loved ones is the hardest blow in life
en_quotes.author: Marlo Thomas

en_quotes.quote: Excessive sorrow laughs. Excessive joy weeps
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Interest does not tie nations together; it sometimes separates them. But sympathy and understanding does unite them
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: A sorrow's crown of sorrow is remembering happier times
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: Those who weep recover more quickly than those who smile
en_quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

en_quotes.quote: Farewell, dearest friend, never to see one another any more till at the right hand of Christ
en_quotes.author: Donald Cargill

en_quotes.quote: Excess of grief for the dead is madness; for it is an injury to the living, and the dead know it not
en_quotes.author: Xenophon

en_quotes.quote: The heart forgets its sorrow and ache
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: It is only after one is in trouble that one realizes how little sympathy and kindness there are in the world
en_quotes.author: Nellie Bly

en_quotes.quote: I have great sympathy for people that are infertile, but a life is not something you can give away
en_quotes.author: Mary Beth Whitehead

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is beneficial for the body, but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind
en_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

en_quotes.quote: Sorrow is so easy to express and yet so hard to tell
en_quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: It appears to be a law that you cannot have a deep sympathy with both man and nature
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Character is made of duty and love and sympathy, and, above all, of living and working for others
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: Unable are the loved to die, for love is immortality
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: If there was less sympathy in the world, there would be less trouble in the world
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Almost all of our sorrows spring out of our relations with other people
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: From the end spring new beginnings
en_quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

en_quotes.quote: The Nazi movement is in many respects one which has my warmest sympathy
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: And whoever walks a furlong without sympathy walks to his own funeral drest in his shroud
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: A sympathetic friend can be quite as dear as a brother
en_quotes.author: Homer

en_quotes.quote: Our trials, our sorrows, and our grieves develop us
en_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

en_quotes.quote: Not without hope we suffer and we mourn
en_quotes.author: William Wordsworth

en_quotes.quote: Children require guidance and sympathy far more than instruction
en_quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

en_quotes.quote: To desire and expect nothing for oneself and to have profound sympathy for others is genuine holiness
en_quotes.author: Ivan Turgenev

en_quotes.quote: What ye have been ye still shall be, When we are dust the dust among, O yellow flowers!
en_quotes.author: Henry Austin Dobson

en_quotes.quote: The more sympathy you give, the less you need
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

en_quotes.quote: What is lovely never dies, But passes into other loveliness
en_quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

en_quotes.quote: Women have no sympathy and my experience of women is almost as large as Europe
en_quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

en_quotes.quote: I will indulge my sorrows, and give way to all the pangs and fury of despair
en_quotes.author: Joseph Addison

en_quotes.quote: It is foolish to tear one's hair in grief, as though sorrow would be made less by baldness
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Great grief does not of itself put an end to itself
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Autumn wins you best by this its mute appeal to sympathy for its decay
en_quotes.author: Robert Browning

en_quotes.quote: I was brought up to be sympathetic toward others
en_quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

en_quotes.quote: When we are out of sympathy with the young, then I think our work in this world is over
en_quotes.author: George MacDonald

en_quotes.quote: After you have wept and grieved for your physical losses, cherish the functions and the life you have left
en_quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: As Christians, our compassion is simply a response to the love that God has already shown us
en_quotes.author: Steven Curtis Chapman

en_quotes.quote: There is no grief like the grief that does not speak
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: I'm not looking for sympathy at all
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: If you suppress grief too much, it can well redouble
en_quotes.author: Moliere

en_quotes.quote: Marriage must be a relation either of sympathy or of conquest
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: All sympathy not consistent with acknowledged virtue is but disguised selfishness
en_quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

en_quotes.quote: Grieve and mourn for yourself not once or twice, but again and again
en_quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: You don't go around grieving all the time, but the grief is still there and always will be
en_quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

en_quotes.quote: When you're successful, people have no sympathy. Nobody wants to catch the tears of a millionaire
en_quotes.author: Boy George

en_quotes.quote: Ninnu Kori' urges us to take a broader view of life, look past stumbling blocks, and rise above self sympathy
en_quotes.author: Nani

en_quotes.quote: I didn't go to university. Didn't even finish A-levels. But I have sympathy for those who did
en_quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

en_quotes.quote: The natural effect of sorrow over the dead is to refine and elevate the mind
en_quotes.author: Washington Irving

en_quotes.quote: Any mind that is capable of real sorrow is capable of good
en_quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

en_quotes.quote: I like the Rolling Stones for karaoke. 'Sympathy For The Devil' is a great one
en_quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

en_quotes.quote: One often calms one's grief by recounting it
en_quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

en_quotes.quote: There is a joy in sorrow which none but a mourner can know
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: A crowd always thinks with its sympathy, never with its reason
en_quotes.author: William R. Alger

en_quotes.quote: We were united not only by political respect for each other, but also by deep mutual sympathy as people
en_quotes.author: Helmut Kohl

en_quotes.quote: Sympathy is charming, but it does not make up for pain
en_quotes.author: Lillie Langtry

en_quotes.quote: If we wait until our lives are free from sorrow or difficulty, then we wait forever. And miss the entire point
en_quotes.author: Dirk Benedict

en_quotes.quote: The humanitarian lays stress almost solely upon breadth of knowledge and sympathy
en_quotes.author: Irving Babbitt

en_quotes.quote: The true humanist maintains a just balance between sympathy and selection
en_quotes.author: Irving Babbitt

en_quotes.quote: I have a strong sympathy for all women who have struggled and suffered
en_quotes.author: Edmonia Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Sympathy is the first condition of criticism
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: September 11th was a moment when America had the sympathy of the world
en_quotes.author: Tom Ford

en_quotes.quote: Sympathy is something that shouldn't be bestowed upon the Yankees. Apparently it angers them
en_quotes.author: Bob Feller

en_quotes.quote: I damaged my health during 'Les Mis,' which I didn't want to mention in case it seemed like I was courting sympathy
en_quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

en_quotes.quote: Our sympathy is cold to the relation of distant misery
en_quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

en_quotes.quote: I've never wanted sympathy votes in anything I do in my life
en_quotes.author: Amy Purdy

en_quotes.quote: Having a baby is a disaster for your career. I don't think there's any sympathy
en_quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

en_quotes.quote: Your sympathy is worthless to people in need without action
en_quotes.author: Andy Dunn

en_quotes.quote: You will find that the woman who is really kind to dogs is always one who has failed to inspire sympathy in men
en_quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

en_quotes.quote: What's interesting to me is that people engage survivors from a place of pity all the time - a place of sympathy
en_quotes.author: Tarana Burke

en_quotes.quote: I felt bad when George Bush was booed. But only briefly. My sympathy for that man has a half-life of about four seconds
en_quotes.author: Dick Cavett

en_quotes.quote: You are 27 or 28 right? It is very tough to live at that age. When nothing is sure. I have sympathy with you
en_quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

en_quotes.quote: Motherhood is at its best when the tender chords of sympathy have been touched
en_quotes.author: Paul P. Harris

en_quotes.quote: The cure for sorrow is to learn something
en_quotes.author: Barbara Sher

en_quotes.quote: The irony is that I'm actually a very empathetic person, but I don't believe in sympathy at all
en_quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

en_quotes.quote: Men are often biased in their judgment on account of their sympathy and their interests
en_quotes.author: George William Norris

en_quotes.quote: Sympathy is important, but it rings hollow if not followed by action
en_quotes.author: Chris Murphy

en_quotes.quote: The only cure for grief is action
en_quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

en_quotes.quote: I grew up an Orthodox Jew, and now I'm not an Orthodox Jew. So I have sympathy for people who lose their faith
en_quotes.author: Naomi Alderman

en_quotes.quote: My guitar was loud as hell, and I had no sympathy for anybody else
en_quotes.author: Brownie McGhee

en_quotes.quote: I have no sympathy for debunking human achievements that, in the end, gave ordinary people liberty
en_quotes.author: Paul Craig Roberts

en_quotes.quote: Teetotallers lack the sympathy and generosity of men that drink
en_quotes.author: W. H. Davies

en_quotes.quote: A lot of actors find it impossible not to ask for the audience's sympathy. They have a need to twinkle
en_quotes.author: Julian Fellowes

en_quotes.quote: Sympathy for victims is always counter-balanced by an equal and opposite feeling of resentment towards them
en_quotes.author: Ben Elton

en_quotes.quote: There's no greater way to gain an audience's sympathy than by being unfortunate
en_quotes.author: Seth Green

en_quotes.quote: There is a great deal of sympathy amongst workers for the Occupy Wall Street movement. We understand their frustration
en_quotes.author: Sharan Burrow

en_quotes.quote: There's a great tradition of actors taking on parts of much less obvious sympathy
en_quotes.author: Edward Zwick

en_quotes.quote: I never ask for mercy and seek no one's sympathy
en_quotes.author: Conrad Black

en_quotes.quote: Although I'm Australian, I find myself much more in sympathy with the Austrian version!
en_quotes.author: David Chalmers

en_quotes.quote: There's little place for sympathy in football
en_quotes.author: Toni Kroos

en_quotes.quote: Developing our sympathetic compassion is not only possible but the only reason for us to be here on earth
en_quotes.author: George Saunders

en_quotes.quote: Barton Fink is just too self-important as an artist to get much sympathy
en_quotes.author: Ethan Coen

en_quotes.quote: Whether rich people make money or lose money, they get no sympathy from the public
en_quotes.author: Gary Ackerman

en_quotes.quote: I feel like there's a lot of sympathy and camaraderie among documentary filmmakers
en_quotes.author: Morgan Neville

en_quotes.quote: I have buckets of sympathy for the obese, often subject to cruelty, ridicule, denunciation, and contempt
en_quotes.author: Lionel Shriver

en_quotes.quote: It's difficult when you're on loan, especially when you're not a young player who people may have sympathy for
en_quotes.author: Joe Hart

en_quotes.quote: I would certainly not support Trump in any way shape or form, but I want to have sympathy
en_quotes.author: Andrew Haigh

en_quotes.quote: Children, even infants, are capable of sympathy. But only after adolescence are we capable of compassion
en_quotes.author: Louise J. Kaplan

en_quotes.quote: NFL fans have less sympathy for fallen players than the Romans had for blind Christians
en_quotes.author: Stephen Rodrick

en_quotes.quote: There are times when a sports figure doesn't deserve sympathy
en_quotes.author: Stephen Rodrick

en_quotes.quote: He bit his lip in a manner which immediately awakened my maternal sympathy, and I helped him bite it
en_quotes.author: S. J. Perelman

en_quotes.quote: Jamal Khashoggi was a Muslim Brotherhood operative, and so I don't really feel sympathy for him
en_quotes.author: Laura Loomer

en_quotes.quote: Recognition of belligerency as an expression of sympathy is all very well
en_quotes.author: Henry Cabot Lodge

en_quotes.quote: You have to have sympathy for and an empathy with a character in order to play them
en_quotes.author: Laura Carmichael

en_quotes.quote: I'd lied many times: to bolster my credentials, to elicit sympathy, to make myself appear less ordinary
en_quotes.author: Michael Finkel

en_quotes.quote: I joined the Party definitely in 1923 after having already been in sympathy with it before
en_quotes.author: Fritz Sauckel

en_quotes.quote: I don't care about sympathy. I care about playing a character who's understandable and clear
en_quotes.author: Anson Mount

en_quotes.quote: I don't think it's an incredibly radical premise to try and have sympathy for someone who has made a mistake
en_quotes.author: Joe Cornish

en_quotes.quote: It's hard for me to think of others because I'm not particularly in sympathy with the music of this century
en_quotes.author: Alan Hovhaness

en_quotes.quote: Sympathy is two hearts tugging at one load
en_quotes.author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

en_quotes.quote: In any business, the more you learn, the more sympathetic you can be to other people's positions
en_quotes.author: Peter Asher

en_quotes.quote: Grief is only the memory of widowed affections
en_quotes.author: James Martineau

en_quotes.quote: Poetry is partly sympathy, don't you think? If it's any good, it gets people to think about others' points of view
en_quotes.author: Edwin Morgan

en_quotes.quote: Sympathy with nature is part of a good person's religion
en_quotes.author: Francis Herbert Hedge
